item.title: [Help]~Making talking npc
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Hello i wanna get this npc to talk a bit.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 599) {
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Make over here!”;
}

i have try to set this in my clint.java but.

  1. i dont know where to place it
  2. if i just place it i get error.
    (Im useing deltascape)

Please can some help me. out of you problem thanks you ,.

Read full topic
